body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Anthony Foster and the customer's name is Amanda Williams.  The conversation is about Dogs Playing Poker (a Art Gallery ) and is a conversation about typical situation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling XYZ Services. My name is John. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi John, I'm having an issue with my account and need some help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'd be happy to help with that. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is Sarah Thompson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sarah. Could you please provide me with your account number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's one two three four five six seven eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. Now, could I also have the last four digits of your social security number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's six seven eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Sarah. Let me pull up your account details.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Alright, I've located your account. Thank you for your patience. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all I needed for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sarah. Thank you for your time and have a great day!
